##  Favicon - "SL" Logo

**Download**: [SVG](images/favicon-sl.svg) | [PNG](images/favicon-sl.png) | [PDF](images/favicon-sl.pdf)

Bold, readable "SL" favicon with brand gradient - perfect visibility at all sizes.

<details>
<summary>Show SVG code</summary>

```svg
<svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <title>Sustainability Lab - SL Favicon</title>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#667eea;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#764ba2;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="48" fill="url(#bgGradient)" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="4"/>
  <text x="28" y="68" font-family="Roboto, system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="42" font-weight="700" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">S</text>
  <text x="72" y="68" font-family="Roboto, system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="42" font-weight="700" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">L</text>
</svg>
```

</details>

### Multiple Sizes Available:
- **Standard**: [favicon-sl.svg](images/favicon-sl.svg) (100x100)
- **Small**: [favicon-16.svg](images/favicon-16.svg) (16x16) 
- **Medium**: [favicon-32.svg](images/favicon-32.svg) (32x32)

## Presentation Templates

For lab presentations, slides, and other materials, check out our comprehensive template repository:

**[Lab Presentation Templates](https://github.com/sustainability-lab/lab-templates)**

This repository contains:

- PowerPoint and Google Slides templates
- Poster templates
- Consistent branding guidelines
- Pre-formatted layouts for conferences and talks

## Website Management

### Adding Publications

See [papers/README.md](papers/README.md) for complete documentation on adding publications.

**Quick workflow:**
1. Add `.bib` file to `papers/bibtex/`
2. Add entry to `papers/index.qmd`
3. Add image to `papers/YYYY/`
4. Push - exports auto-generate via GitHub Actions
